208.title: 2. ë‚´ì ì„ ì´ìš©í•œ ì „ê°œ
208.content: . | ì¢Œë³€ $|\vec{u} - \vec{v}|^2$ì„ ë‚´ì ìœ¼ë¡œ í’€ê¸° . | ë²¡í„°ì˜ ê¸¸ì´ ì œê³±ì€ ë‚´ì ìœ¼ë¡œ í‘œí˜„ ê°€ëŠ¥ | . | . \[(\vec{u} - \vec{v}) \cdot (\vec{u} - \vec{v}) = \\ \vec{u} \cdot \vec{u} - \vec{u} \cdot \vec{v} - \vec{v} \cdot \vec{u} + \vec{v} \cdot \vec{v}\] . \[\|\vec{u}\|^2 - 2(\vec{u}\cdot \vec{v}) + \|\vec{v}\|^2\] . | ìš°ë³€ì˜ ì½”ì‚¬ì¸ ë²•ì¹™ê³¼ í’€ì´ | . \[\|\vec{u}\|^2 - 2(\vec{u}\cdot \vec{v}) + \|\vec{v}\|^2 = \|\vec{u}\|^2 + \|\vec{v}\|^2 - 2 \|\vec{u}\| \|\vec{v}\| \cos \theta\] . \[\cancel{\|\vec{u}\|^2} - 2(\vec{u}\cdot \vec{v}) + \cancel{\|\vec{v}\|^2} = \cancel{\|\vec{u}\|^2} + \cancel{\|\vec{v}\|^2} - 2 \|\vec{u}\| \|\vec{v}\| \cos \theta\] . \[-2(\vec{u}\cdot \vec{v}) = -2 \|\vec{u}\| \|\vec{v}\| \cos \theta\] . | ë‚¨ì€ ì¢Œìš°ë³€ì„ 2ë¡œ ë‚˜ëˆˆ í›„ | . \[\vec{u} \cdot \vec{v} = \|\vec{u}\| \|\vec{v}\| \cos \theta\] ë”°ë¼ì„œ ë‘ ë²¡í„°ì™€ ì‚¬ì´ì˜ ê°ì€ ë‘ ë²¡í„°ì˜ ë‚´ì ê³¼ ê° ë²¡í„°ì˜ í¬ê¸° ì‚¬ì´ì˜ ê´€ê³„ë¡œ ì •ì˜ëœë‹¤ .

211.title: ë‚´ì ì˜ ê¸°í•˜í•™ì  ì˜ë¯¸
211.content: . | ë‚´ì ì€ ë‘ ë²¡í„°ì˜ ë°©í–¥ ìœ ì‚¬ì„±ì„ ìˆ˜ì¹˜í™” í•œë‹¤ | cosÎ¸ëŠ” ë°©í–¥ ìœ ì‚¬ì„±ì˜ ì²™ë„ì´ë‹¤ | . \[\vec{u}\cdot\vec{v} > 0 \\ \rightarrow ì˜ˆê° \ (\theta < 90\degree)\] . | ì˜ˆì‹œ | . \[\vec{u} = \begin{bmatrix}3\\1\end{bmatrix}, \quad \vec{v} = \begin{bmatrix}2\\2\end{bmatrix}\] . | ë‚´ì  ê³„ì‚° | . \[\vec{u} \cdot \vec{v} = (3 \times 2) + (1 \times 2) = 8\] . | ê°ë„ ê³„ì‚° | . \[\cos \theta = \frac{8}{\sqrt{3^2 + 1^2} \times \sqrt{2^2 + 2^2}} = \frac{8}{\sqrt{10} \times \sqrt{8}} \approx 0.894\] . \[\theta \approx \cos^{-1}(0.894) \approx 26.6^\circ\] . \[\vec{u}\cdot\vec{v} = 0 \\ \rightarrow ì§ê° \ (\theta = 90\degree)\] . | ì˜ˆì‹œ | . \[\vec{u} = \begin{bmatrix}1\\0\end{bmatrix}, \quad \vec{v} = \begin{bmatrix}0\\2\end{bmatrix}\] . | ë‚´ì  ê³„ì‚° | . \[\vec{u} \cdot \vec{v} = (1 \times 0) + (0 \times 2) = 0\] . | ê°ë„ ê³„ì‚° | . \[\cos \theta = \frac{0}{\sqrt{1^2 + 0^2} \times \sqrt{0^2 + 2^2}} = 0\] . \[\theta = 90^\circ\] . \[\vec{u}\cdot\vec{v} < 0 \\ \rightarrow ë‘”ê° \ (\theta > 90\degree)\] . | ì˜ˆì‹œ | . \[\vec{u} = \begin{bmatrix}-2\\-1\end{bmatrix}, \quad \vec{v} = \begin{bmatrix}1\\1\end{bmatrix}\] . | ë‚´ì  ê³„ì‚° | . \[\vec{u} \cdot \vec{v} = (-2 \times 1) + (-1 \times 1) = -3\] . | ê°ë„ ê³„ì‚° | . \[\cos \theta = \frac{-3}{\sqrt{(-2)^2 + (-1)^2} \times \sqrt{1^2 + 1^2}} = \frac{-3}{\sqrt{5} \times \sqrt{2}} \approx -0.948\] . \[\theta \approx \cos^{-1}(-0.948) \approx 161.6^\circ\] .

212.title: ë‚´ì ê³¼ ê° ê³„ì‚° ì˜ˆì‹œ
